title: Petition to make Veigar a caster minion skin!
body: The previous thread got removed as it was in the wrong section but, same thing! Who else would find it hilarious to have a caster minion skin for veigar? It could be a definitely not veigar skin or something along those lines

replies.body: call it "undercover viegar" he gets red caster if on blue side and vise versa
